about_the_game:
《Berserk World》 is a free-to-play third-person online action survival competitive game. In the world of sword and magic, the classic gameplay elements of ARPG and RPG are integrated, as well as the battle royale's poison circle and Tarkov's PVP+PVE+ evacuation mechanism gameplay.

【Role/Skill】In terms of characters, we have adopted the traditional iron triangle class structure of MMORPG (warrior, mage, priest). Of course (thieves, hunters, knights, druids, etc.) will continue to join...... This will allow you to build more teams with different perks and strengths. Each character has 2 active skills and 4 passive skills, and players can replace passive skills to obtain different class schools in order to choose the combat style they are good at.

[Equipment/Attributes] In terms of skills and equipment attributes, because it is biased towards action games, we let all characters or professions be equipped with any weapons and equipment, and the attributes are the same, any character, any attribute obtained, can play a vital role in the entire game process. We hope to be able to conjure up more teams that are more genre-oriented based on that.

【System/Setting】During the game, players can find treasure chests or kill mobs and bosses to obtain equipment and supplies, and of course, they can also chase down the rest of the players to obtain all their items. However, players need to pay attention to dodging the poison circle, and finally survive until the specified time, and then safely evacuate after the portal is opened. Only 1 person can be evacuated from the first 6 portals, and the last portal is for the entire team to evacuate together. Note: If you die once, all your equipment will be dropped. However, you can still buy basic equipment from the merchant, or you can use your luck to mix up equipment.

If you're able to get out of the game safely, you can sell your loot on the Trading House or give away your friends for free. Of course, you can also go to the merchant and sell ordinary equipment directly.
